date.description: The date when the data was collected.

channel_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube channel.

video_id.description: The unique identifier of the YouTube video.

live_or_on_demand.description: Indicates if the video content is live or on-demand.

subscribed_status.description: Indicates if the viewer is subscribed to the channel.

country_code.description: The country code where the data was collected.

annotation_id.description: The unique identifier for the annotation.

annotation_impressions.description: The total number of times annotations were displayed to viewers.

annotation_clickable_impressions.description: The number of impressions where annotations are clickable.

annotation_clicks.description: The total number of clicks on annotations.

annotation_click_through_rate.description: The percentage of impressions that resulted in clicks on the annotations.

annotation_closable_impressions.description: The number of impressions where annotations are closable.

annotation_closes.description: The total number of times viewers closed the annotations.

annotation_close_rate.description: The percentage of impressions that resulted in closing the annotations.
